dutch.quote: Wie zichzelf bewaart, bewaart geen rotte appel.
dutch.translation: Those who keep themselves, don’t keep a bad apple.
dutch.meaning: You have to be careful with yourself because you are not replaceable.

dutch.quote: Zelfs de beste breister laat wel eens een steekje vallen
dutch.translation: Even the best knitter drops a stitch sometimes.
dutch.meaning: Even if someone can do something very well, he (or she) will sometimes make a mistake; that is forgivable.

dutch.quote: Aan de rand van het ravijn bloeien de mooiste bloemen.
dutch.translation: The most beautiful flowers bloom at the edge of the ravine.
dutch.meaning: Those who dare to take risks can achieve exceptional results.

dutch.quote: Alle wegen leiden naar Rome.
dutch.translation: All roads lead to Rome.
dutch.meaning: All the methods of doing something will achieve the same result in the end.

dutch.quote: Als de ene hand de ander wast worden ze allebei schoon
dutch.translation: When one hand washes the other, they both get clean.
dutch.meaning: When you work together and help each other, what has to be done gets done faster.

dutch.quote: Een goed begin is het halve werk
dutch.translation: A good start will save you work in the end.

dutch.quote: Boontje komt om zijn loontje.
dutch.translation: You will get what you deserve if you’ve done something that’s not accepted.

dutch.quote: Al doende leert men.
dutch.translation: Only by trying will you learn the skills you need.

dutch.quote: Een ezel stoot zich in het algemeen, niet twee keer aan dezelfde steen.
dutch.translation: Not even a donkey will make the same mistake twice.

dutch.quote: Als je wilt dat de kippen eieren leggen, dan moet je het kakelen verdragen.
dutch.translation: If you want to achieve something, you will have to live with both the positive and negative impact.

dutch.quote: Groene krieken worden rood, kleine kinders worden groot
dutch.translation: Green cherries turn red, small children grow up.
dutch.meaning: Everything can change.

dutch.quote: Met je hoed in de hand kom je door het ganse land.
dutch.translation: With your hand in hand, you’ll go through the entire country.
dutch.meaning: You can accomplish more by being polite and kind.

dutch.quote: Onbekend maakt onbemind
dutch.translation: Unknown makes unloved.
dutch.meaning: People tend to be scared of what they don’t know or understand.

dutch.quote: Oost, west, thuis best
dutch.translation: East, west, home best.
dutch.meaning: There’s no place like home.

dutch.quote: Als de kalveren op het ijs dansen
dutch.translation: “When the calves dance on the ice” or “When pigs fly”

dutch.quote: Acht is meer dan duizend
dutch.translation: Eight is more than thousand
dutch.meaning: Every little thing helps

dutch.quote: Wat er ook gebeurt, altijd blijven lachen
dutch.translation: Whatever happens, do not stop laughing
dutch.meaning: Do not lose hope.

dutch.quote: “Het is nog geen avond”, zei de kraaienvanger.
dutch.translation: It is not night yet, said the crow catcher.
dutch.meaning: Do not lose faith. As long as it is not night yet, you can still catch the crows.

dutch.quote: Achter de dikste gordijnen wordt het hardste gehuild
dutch.translation: Behind the thickest curtains are the loudest cries
dutch.meaning: Do not let the richness of others full you; happiness does not equal money.

dutch.quote: Zonder wrijving, geen glans
dutch.translation: Without friction, no shine.
dutch.meaning: Without any effort, you will not reach the best possible result.

dutch.quote: De een scheert schapen, de ander varkens
dutch.translation: One shears sheep, the other pigs
dutch.meaning: The world isn't fair

dutch.quote: Men moet zich krommen, wil men door de wereld kommen
dutch.translation: Hard work pays off
dutch.meaning: You need to work hard to get something in this world.

dutch.quote: De hond in de pot vinden
dutch.translation: Dining with Duke Humphrey
dutch.meaning: Being too late to diner

dutch.quote: De omgekeerde wereld
dutch.translation: The world turned upside down, topsy turvy
dutch.meaning: The opposite of what is logical and trusted

dutch.quote: Jong geleerd, oud gedaan
dutch.translation: What learned in the cradle, is carried to the tomb
dutch.meaning: What you learn in your youth, will become useful in your adult life.

dutch.quote: Wat gij niet wilt dat u geschiedt, doet dat ook de ander niet.
dutch.translation: What you do not want to be done to you, do not do to others.
dutch.meaning: Do not wish on others what you would not wish on yourself.

dutch.quote: Achter de wolken schijnt de zon.
dutch.translation: Behind the clouds the sun shines.
dutch.meaning: All bad things are temporary and then it gets better.

dutch.quote: Als er een schaap over de dam is, volgen er meer
dutch.translation: If one sheep crosses the ditch, more will follow.
dutch.meaning: If one person has tried something new, others dare to do it too

dutch.quote: Blaffende honden bijten niet.
dutch.translation: Barking dogs don't bite.
dutch.meaning: Those who shout the loudest are the least dangerous.

dutch.quote: Beter een vogel in de hand dan tien in de lucht.
dutch.translation: Better one bird in the hand than ten in the air.
dutch.meaning: Better a little than none at all / small concrete results are better than big plans.
